job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: We are hiring senior developers for my US/Canada team with - experience in workflow engines like Camunda, Airflow, etc. - proficient in design and implementation of microservices-based, API/Endpoint architectures. - strong background in designing and developing event-based/pub-sub workflows & digestion engines. - Proficiency with 2 or more programming languages like Java, Go, Node.js, Scala or similar - Expertise in Kafka at scale and working experience with No-SQL DBs - Good understanding of AWS development and deployment
